title: Toilet seat that detects congestive heart failure getting ready to begin commercialization

title_detail.value: Toilet seat that detects congestive heart failure getting ready to begin commercialization

summary: A toilet-seat based cardiovascular monitoring system aims to lower the hospital readmission rates of patients with congestive heart failure.
